mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (no, category, id, subject, content, group_id) VALUES( board_no_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1, 1) FROM board ))
INSERT INTO Board_Reply(no,id,bno,content,group_id) VALUES( Board_Reply_no_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{bno}, #{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1,1) FROM Board_Reply) )
mapper.select: SELECT no,id,bno,content, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY"." MM"." DD HH24:MI') as dbday,group_tab FROM Board_Reply WHERE bno=#{bno} ORDER BY group_id DESC,group_step ASC
